About Lorenzo's Music

We are an experimental lofi rock band pushing the boundaries of underground music. Our sound combines raw energy with atmospheric textures, creating a unique blend of noise, melody, and emotion.

Drawing inspiration from the forgotten era of underground music, we create soundscapes that transport listeners to a world of gritty authenticity and raw expression.
